      void filter​(javax.ws.rs.container.ContainerRequestContext requestContext, javax.ws.rs.container.ContainerResponseContext responseContext)
      This function adds headers to the response context to enable cross-origin resource sharing (CORS) for various HTTP methods and headers.

    • Method Detail

      • filter

        public void filter​(javax.ws.rs.container.ContainerRequestContext requestContext,
                   javax.ws.rs.container.ContainerResponseContext responseContext)
            throws java.io.IOException
        This function adds headers to the response context to enable cross-origin resource sharing (CORS) for various HTTP methods and headers.
        Specified by:
        filter in interface javax.ws.rs.container.ContainerResponseFilter
        Parameters:
        requestContext - The request context represents the incoming HTTP request. It contains information such as the request headers, request method, request URI, and request entity.
        responseContext - The response context represents the response that will be sent back to the client. It contains information such as the response headers and the response entity.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
